creator: d.alexander@lse.ac.uk
text:
Would be useful if at least isUnavailable property of 
org.apache.catalina.core.StandardWrapper was exposed as an MBean property.

Possible also the available property too.

Created attachment 21210
Exposes StandardWrapper unavailable and available properties to JMX 

Not sure if I created the patch correctly, best if someone checks that. Have
tested this code works with 5.5.25 though.
creator: d.alexander@lse.ac.uk
d.alexander@lse.ac.uk
text: This could also be applied to the 6.x branch.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: There is no unavailable property but the available property is already exposed in Tomcat 7. A patch has been proposed for Tomcat 6 and Tomcat 5.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Fixed in 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.30 onwards.

creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text: Fixed in 5.5 with r1057531 and will be in 5.5.32.
